content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Describe and analyze the changes that led to Europe’s rapid population growth in the eighteenth century.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Describe and analyze the changes that led to Europe’s rapid population growth in the eighteenth century.

topic.text: 3.3: Continuities and Changes to Economic Practice and Development

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
